title: 5 Reasons You Really Need To Go See ‘Dungeons & Dragons: Honor Among Thieves’ In Theaters
description: Dungeons & Dragons: Honor Among Theaters is a shockingly great fantasy movie that really captures the fun and magic of D&D tabletop gaming, but manages to be an exciting, entertaining movie for everyone whether or not you play the game. Go see it on the biggest screen you can find!

title: Trump Runs Facebook Ads Calling Indictment ‘Darkest Chapter Of American History’
description: Former president Donald Trump started running Facebook ads on Friday calling his pending indictment "the darkest chapter in American history."

title: Frozen Strawberries Recalled As Hepatitis A Outbreak Has Left 2 Hospitalized
description: This includes frozen organic strawberries sold at Costco, Aldi, KeHE, Vital Choice Seafood, PCC Community Markets, and Trader Joe's.

title: It’s No Joke: Australia’s Grey Nurse Sharks Are In Grave Danger
description: Fighting for these animals most of her life, Australian diving icon Valerie Taylor thinks only one thing will properly conserve these sharks.

title: Availability Of Over-The-Counter Narcan Could Help As A Tool To Combat The Illicit Fentanyl Crisis, But Affordability Remains An Issue
description: Narcan nasal spray is the first naloxone product to formally be available OTC. While it may take months before Narcan becomes available OTC - and once in pharmacies as an off-the-shelf product its price could keep it out of reach  for many - this still represents an important regulatory action.

title: ‘Dungeons And Dragons,’ Great Box Office, Great Reviews, Great Audience Scores
description: I’ll be honest, I had relatively little hope in the idea that a Dungeons and Dragons branded movie starring Chris Pine and Michelle Rodriguez would be anything but an not-great attempt to make a comedic Lord of the Rings-type offering.

title: 'Yellowjackets' Season 2 Finally Did The Thing
description: I have been starting to get a little worried about Yellowjackets, that they are going to get too “LOST” with their long teases and eventual answers (or lack thereof). But as of this week, I’m starting to feel more confident that they’re going to get it right.

title: Google Brings PostgreSQL-Compatible AlloyDB To Multicloud, Data Centers And The Edge
description: Compared to the standard, open source PostgreSQL, AlloyDB Omni delivers 2x faster performance and 100x faster analytical queries.

title: Drug Development For Neglected Tropical Diseases Is Finally Getting A Tool That Can Get The Job Done
description: The neglected tropical diseases impact millions of the world’s poorest each year. Now researchers in Africa can advance their drug discovery efforts through Collaborative Drug Discovery.

title: Electric Upcycling Is The Future Of Commercial Vehicles Says Lunaz
description: Lunaz made its name electrifying iconic classics, but upcycling commercial vehicles to EVs will have the biggest environmental impact, and it intends to make 5,000 of them a year.

title: Cano Health’s Board Drama Comes As Primary Care Firms Try To Attract Buyers
description: Primary care provider Cano Health has been forced to defend the resignation of board members including billionaire Barry Sternlicht who publicly criticized the company’s CEO and operating performance.

title: Women Making History In Climate Change – ‘We Can't Wait For Anybody To Give Us Permission’
description:
Quietly, under the radar, one decision at a time, women across the globe are tackling climate change in their local communities & improving their lives and economies.
For Women’s History Month 2023, here are five to celebrate and thank.
